RoleDescription: We are seeking an experienced technology futurist to join our Innovation Office.As one of the world's leading enterprise AI platforms, and with more than 85% of the Fortune 500 as customers, how we imagine and build for the future of work matters.This first-of-its-kind role within ServiceNow will focus on in-depth foresight research and scenario development that helps bridge the gap between emerging technologies and their escalating impact on how our businesses, our economy, and our society operate and evolve. The strategic foresight you will actively shape our customers' understanding of AI-first business transformation.As Director of ServiceNow Futures, you will be a research-driven strategic advisor and communicator. Excelling across this spectrum will require the following;A naturally creative and visionary mindset, comfortable with challenging orthodoxies, and fluent in the socio-technical dynamics of technology and business.A disciplined, human-centered researcher and formally trained practitioner of strategic foresight & futures methodologies/frameworks, STEEP informed trend & driver analysis, forecasting, participatory research, systems mapping, scenario planning & development, back casting, and wind tunneling.A compelling writer and storyteller, able to distill complexity and mess into meaningful insights and strategies for C-level executives, innovation leaders, and customers.A disciplined leader, grounded by experience driving agendas and change within large organizations and able to speak fluently to the organizational value of Strategic Foresight.A highly collaborative and approachable style, able to work effectively with personas across the enterprise and the technical/non-technical spectrum. Ultimately, we are looking for a leader who is interested in helping to build a new organizational capability and muscle within the Innovation Office at ServiceNow and who is excited to leverage our platform and market position in service of our mission to make the world work better for everyone. Responsibilities:Futures Research: Develop a future-focused research plan/program aligned with innovation leadership priorities. Manage muti-stakeholder foresight research process from scanning through to scenario and strategy development. Conduct in-depth primary and secondary research on trends related to the technology, industry, or persona of focus. This includes direct engagement with customers, executives, and industry experts in technology, manufacturing, financial services, healthcare, hospitality, and beyond. Explore how the intelligent enterprise of the future may evolve, as well as the technological stack on which it is built. Collaborate with the team to bring foresight scenarios to life using rich narrative, visual illustration, design fiction, and, where possible, technical prototypes. Publishing & Thought Leadership: Develop and align an editorial calendar that flows directly from the research program and Innovation Office priorities. Author thought leadership content, including forecasting reports, executive briefings, and articles that help to effectively disseminate insights internally at ServiceNow helping to drive deeper engagement with the Innovation Office and externally with our customers, helping to position ServiceNow as a thought leader. Customer & Stakeholder Engagement: Present to internal teams and customers to inform strategic decisions about business strategy development, technology, and resource investments. Collaborate with marketing and innovation teams to amplify thought leadership through content marketing vehicles, events, webinars, and media opportunities.
